career_path_selected: AI Researcher at a Global AI Lab

milestones.title: Master Python Programming
milestones.description: Gain a strong foundation in Python, essential for AI research.
steps: Complete an advanced Python course online.
Build small projects to apply Python skills practically.

milestones.title: Learn TensorFlow
milestones.description: Develop proficiency in TensorFlow for machine learning applications.
steps: Enroll in a TensorFlow specialization course.
Create a simple neural network using TensorFlow.

milestones.title: Contribute to an Open-Source Project
milestones.description: Engage with the AI community by contributing to open-source projects.
steps: Identify a relevant AI project on GitHub.
Submit at least two contributions or improvements.

milestones.title: Research and Publish a Paper
milestones.description: Conduct research and get published in a recognized journal or conference.
steps: Select a niche topic within AI research.
Draft and submit a paper to an academic conference.

milestones.title: Network with AI Professionals
milestones.description: Build connections with professionals in the AI community.
steps: Join AI-focused online forums and participate in discussions.

milestones.title: Pursue Advanced Education
milestones.description: Consider pursuing a master's or PhD specializing in AI.
steps: Research graduate programs aligned with AI research.
Apply to at least two programs that fit your goals.

milestones.title: Secure an Internship
milestones.description: Gain practical experience through an internship at an AI lab.
steps: Prepare a compelling resume and portfolio.
Apply to internships at renowned AI research institutions like Google DeepMind.
